Text: Alternative Recipes
Unlock alternative recipes for your factories.
You need to unlock this recipe in the Scientific Projects first.
Plank Bulk Processing
Planks (Bulk)
"Stack them high, cut them slow—more planks for the haul!" — Broadaxe Bulkchew
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Logs ⇒ {1} Planks in {2} hours in the Lumbermill
Direct Log Forging
Gears (Direct)
Beavers discovered they could gnaw logs into rough shapes and hammer them into gears, skipping the plank step entirely. It’s crude, but it works.
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Logs ⇒ {1} Gears in {2} hours in the Gear Workshop
Rapid Gear Press
Gears (Rapid)
By rushing the presses and piling on extra wood, beavers churn out gears faster—though the waste pile grows just as quickly.
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Planks ⇒ {1} Gears in {2} hours in the Gear Workshop
High-Yield Log Press
Gears (High-Yield)
After seasons of trial, beavers perfected a water-driven press that turns raw logs into gears at breakneck speed—a marvel of late-season ingenuity.
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Logs ⇒ {1} Gears in {2} hours in the Gear Workshop
Resin-Fired Smelter
Metal Blocks (Resin-Fired)
Folktails tapped into the sticky power of pine resin, crafting a smelter that burns slow and steady for swift metalwork.
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Scrap Metal + {1} Pine Resin ⇒ {2} Metal Blocks in {3} hours in the Smelter (Folktails only)
Wood-Reinforced Alloy
Metal Blocks (Wood-Reinforced)
'With every plank we add, the metal grows stronger—nature and iron as one!' — Leafclaw Metalweaver
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Scrap Metal + {1} Treated Planks ⇒ {2} Metal Blocks in {3} hours in the Smelter (Folktails only)
Steel-Bound Planks
Treated Planks (Steel-Bound)
Iron Teeth ingenuity turned the tables—smelting metal scraps into a binding lattice that hardens planks without a drop of resin.
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Planks + {1} Metal Blocks ⇒ {2} Treated Planks in {3} hours in the Wood Workshop (Iron Teeth only)
Timberbot Framework
"Our bots now dance with the strength of the forest—planks over steel, a Folktails triumph!" — Gearwhisker Timbercog
Unlock Timberbot Framework: Folktails can use Treated Planks instead of Metal Blocks for their Bot parts. Biofuel is also no longer needed for the Chassis.
Bot Chassis (Timberbot)
Bot Heads (Timberbot)
Helianthic Ember Blend
Biofuel (Sunflower)
"Sunflowers yield a nectar richer than rivers—blend it with a humble tuber, and the refinery sings a fuel-laden hymn!" — Helian Nectarine
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Potatoes + {1} Sunflower Seeds ⇒ {2} Biofuel in {3} hours in the Refinery (Folktails only)
Crude Log Press Extract
Extract (Crude Press)
"We crush logs and scrape metal until the extract drips out—slow, messy, but it beats touching that yuke water!" — Pressjaw Scrapchew
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Logs + {1} Gears + {2} Scrap Metal ⇒ {3} Extract in {4} hours in the Industrial Lumbermill (Iron Teeth only)
Diluted Extract
Extract (Diluted)
By blending pure water with bad water, beavers extract more from the mire—a clever rinse born of necessity.
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Badwater + {1} Water + {2} Log ⇒ {3} Extract in {4} hours in the Centrifuge
Water Filter
Extract (Filtered)
Beavers devised a clever centrifuge tweak, using treated planks to strain bad water—yielding extract and a trickle of fresh water from the sludge.
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Badwater + {1} Treated Plank + {2} Log ⇒ {3} Extract + {4} Water in {5} hours in the Dirt Excavator
Extract-Charged Explosive
Explosives (Extract-Charged)
"One drop of extract, and the blast doubles—gnaw on that, rockface!" — Flintpaw Boomforge
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Extract ⇒ {1} Explosives in {2} hours in the Explosives Factory
Swiftseed Oil Snap
Canola Oil (Rapid)
"Speed trumps all—grind the seeds quick, and let the oil flow, waste be what it may!" — Boltfur Greasesnap
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Canola Seeds ⇒ {1} Canola Oil in {2} hours in the Oil Press (Iron Teeth only)
Canola Essence Refinery
Canola Oil (Precision)
Iron Teeth perfected a meticulous pressing method, coaxing every last drop from canola seeds with industrial finesse.
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Canola Seeds + {1} Water ⇒ {2} Canola Oil in {3} hours in the Oil Press (Iron Teeth only)
Sun-Dried Pulp Sheets
Paper (Sun-Dried)
Folktails harnessed the sun’s warmth, blending logs with sunflower pulp to craft sheets of paper as vast as their fields.
Unlock [Recipe]: {0} Logs + {1} Sunflowers ⇒ {2} Paper in {3} hours in the Paper Mill (Folktails only)
